root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 8-7-1, translated into en
root.data: The number of children involved in child labor corresponds to the number of children reported in child labor during the reference period (usually in the week prior to the survey). The proportion of children in child labor is calculated as the number of children in child labor divided by the total number of children in the population. For the purposes of this indicator, children include all persons aged 5 to 17 years
